title: Still I Persist in Wondering
description: Includes the introduction by Robinson, and a preface by Pangborn. A collection of stories from the author's "Tales of a Darkening World" sequence (which includes his novel, "Davy"). The Children's Crusade (1974); Harper Conan and Singer David (1975); The Legend of Hombas (1974); Tiger Boy (1972); The Witches of Nupal; My Brother Leopold (1973); The Night Wind (1974).
author: Edgar Pangborn
